item.title: Trump administration joins Republicans' campaign to police speech in reaction to Kirk's murder

item.title: Getting Fired For Celebrating Kirk’s Assassination Is Not Cancel Culture, It’s Accountability
item.description: Celebrating the brutal murder of a civilian lacks morals and requires far more accountability than mere ‘cancel culture’ can afford.

item.title: Dark online subculture emerges behind Charlie Kirk's assassination

item.title: Appeals court rejects Trump bid to unseat Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
item.description: A federal appeals court Monday rejected President Trump's move to fire Federal Reserve board member Lisa Cook.

item.title: ‘A Martyr For The Christian Faith’: Attendees Highlight Charlie Kirk’s Legacy Of Faith At Packed Kennedy Center Vigil
item.description: 'Charlie touched a generation,' one attendee told The Federalist, 'he activated them.'

item.title: An Upside-Down Case That Originalism Killed Constitutional Amendments
item.description: Jill Lepore refutes her own argument against originalism.

item.title: Drugmakers Have a Right to Advertise
item.description: The First Amendment applies to commercial speech as well as political speech.

item.title: AI Will Destroy Entire Industries, and That’s a Good Thing
item.description: After each wave of innovation, our country has emerged more prosperous and economically capable. This time will be no different.

item.title: The Atlantic’s Court Historian
item.description: Jill Lepore cuts corners in her case against originalism.

item.title: America in Real Life Must Not Be as Rabid as America Online
item.description: If we honor Charlie Kirk’s legacy of good-faith engagement, we will reflexively step back from the precipice.
